TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BoundPropertyEntry extends System.Web.UI.PropertyEntry

Docs.summary: Represents a control property that is data-bound to an expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When a page is parsed, the page parser retains information about an expression and the property it is bound to in a <xref:System.Web.UI.BoundPropertyEntry> object.
